name: MakingaDifference
0:
”Alexa, start making a difference”
”Make a difference in education”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: making a difference
des:
"Making a Difference" is a skill that connects you with official White House petition. You can search for issues that matter to you, hear about popular petitions, and, for the first time ever, sign them with your voice. If a petition gets enough signatures, White House staff will review it, ensure it is sent to the appropriate policy experts, and issue an official response.

This is the only application that has been granted access by whitehouse.gov to facilitate voice-signing. By providing a voice interface to this public service, more United States citizens will have the opportunity to make their voice heard!

With many new petitions being created daily, be sure to check back to hear the latest issues and see how you can make a difference.

When you link this skill with your Amazon account, your name and email are saved, and are used to sign petitions that you request. You information is stored securely, and is not shared with anyone.

This app uses the We the People API, but is neither endorsed nor certified by the White House, or Amazon.
